titleNullable: Anime Female Characters Dataset with Names
descriptionNullable:
The primary source of data for this dataset is my personal chat history with a waifu-catching bot on Telegram ([@WaifuGacha_bot](https://t.me/waifugacha_bot)).The images and character names have been extracted from these chats to create a comprehensive collection.

The inspiration for creating this dataset came from my desire to apply web scraping techniques in a real-world context while pursuing my interest in anime.

Please be aware that the dataset may contain some incorrect labels, but not more than 30 instances. This can be attributed to occasional issues where the names of banners came in between.

The dataset was created on a whim and may or may not serve specific research purposes. 😆

Thumbnail picture credit - Pinterest
